verses.verse: Then all Israel<WH3478> gathered<WH6908> themselves to David<WH1732> to Hebron,<WH2275> saying,<WH559> "Behold,<WH6106> we are your bone and your flesh.<WH1320>

In times<WH8543> past,<WH8032> even when Saul<WH7586> was king,<WH4428> it was you who led out<WH3318> and brought in<WH935> Israel.<WH3478> Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> said<WH559> to you,<WH7462> 'You shall be shepherd of my people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> and you shall be prince<WH5057> over my people<WH1571> Israel.<WH3478>'"

So all the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478> came<WH935> to the king<WH4428> to Hebron;<WH2275> and David<WH1732> made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with them in Hebron<WH2275> before<WH6440> Yahweh;<WH3068> and they anointed<WH4886> David<WH1732> king<WH4428> over Israel,<WH3478> according to the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> by<WH3027> Samuel.<WH8050>
David<WH1732> and all Israel<WH3478> went<WH3212> to Jerusalem<WH3389> (the same is Jebus<WH2982>); and the Jebusites,<WH2983> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land,<WH776> were there.

The inhabitants<WH3427> of Jebus<WH2982> said<WH559> to David,<WH1732> "You shall not come<WH935> in here.<WH1732>" Nevertheless David took<WH3920> the stronghold<WH4686> of Zion.<WH6726> The same is the city<WH5892> of David.<WH1732>

David<WH1732> said,<WH559> "Whoever strikes<WH5221> the Jebusites<WH2983> first<WH7223> shall be chief<WH7218> and captain.<WH8269>" Joab<WH3097> the son<WH1121> of Zeruiah<WH6870> went<WH5927> up<WH5927> first,<WH7223> and was made chief.<WH7218>
David<WH1732> lived<WH3427> in the stronghold;<WH4679> therefore they called<WH7121> it the city<WH5892> of David.<WH1732>
He built<WH1129> the city<WH5892> all around,<WH5439> from Millo<WH4407> even around;<WH5439> and Joab<WH3097> repaired<WH2421> the rest<WH7605> of the city.<WH5892>
David<WH1732> grew<WH3212> greater<WH1980> and greater;<WH1980> for Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies was with him.<WH6635>

Now these are the chief<WH7218> of the mighty men<WH1368> whom David<WH1732> had,<WH2388> who showed themselves strong with him in his kingdom,<WH4438> together with all Israel,<WH3478> to make him king,<WH4427> according to the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> concerning Israel.<WH3478>

This is the number<WH4557> of the mighty men<WH1368> whom David<WH1732> had:<WH3434> Jashobeam, the son of a Hachmonite,<WH2453> the chief<WH7218> of the thirty;<WH7991> he lifted up<WH5782> his spear<WH2595> against three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> and killed<WH2491> them at one<WH259> time.<WH6471>
After<WH310> him was Eleazar<WH499> the son<WH1121> of Dodo,<WH1734> the Ahohite,<WH266> who was one of the three<WH7969> mighty men.<WH1368>

He was with David<WH1732> at Pasdammim,<WH6450> and there the Philistines<WH6430> were gathered together<WH622> to battle,<WH4421> where there was a plot<WH2513> of ground<WH7704> full<WH4392> of barley;<WH8184> and the people<WH5971> fled<WH5127> from before<WH6440> the Philistines.<WH6430>

They stood<WH3320> in the midst<WH8432> of the plot,<WH2513> and defended<WH5337> it,<WH5221> and killed the Philistines;<WH6430> and Yahweh<WH3068> saved<WH5337> them by a great<WH1419> victory.<WH8668>

Three<WH7969> of the thirty<WH7970> chief<WH7218> men went down<WH3381> to the rock<WH6697> to David,<WH1732> into the cave<WH4631> of Adullam;<WH5725> and the army<WH4264> of the Philistines<WH6430> were encamped<WH2583> in the valley<WH6010> of Rephaim.<WH7497>
David<WH1732> was then in the stronghold,<WH4686> and the garrison<WH5333> of the Philistines<WH6430> was then in Bethlehem.<WH1035>
David<WH1732> longed,<WH183> and said,<WH559> "Oh that one would give me water<WH4325> to drink<WH8248> of the well<WH953> of Bethlehem,<WH1035> which is by the gate!<WH8179>"

The three<WH7969> broke through<WH1234> the army<WH4264> of the Philistines,<WH6430> and drew<WH7579> water<WH4325> out of the well<WH953> of Bethlehem,<WH1035> that was by the gate,<WH8179> and took<WH5375> it,<WH935> and brought it to David:<WH1732> but David<WH1732> would<WH14> not drink<WH8354> of it,<WH5258> but poured it out to Yahweh,<WH3068>

and said,<WH559> "My God<WH430> forbid<WH2486> it me,<WH6213> that I should do this!<WH2063> Shall I drink<WH8354> the blood<WH1818> of these men<WH582> who have put their lives in jeopardy?<WH5315>" For they risked their lives<WH5315> to bring<WH935> it.<WH14> Therefore he would not drink<WH8354> it.<WH7969> The three mighty<WH1368> men did these things.<WH6213>

Abishai,<WH52> the brother<WH251> of Joab,<WH3097> he was chief<WH7218> of the three;<WH7969> for he lifted up<WH5782> his spear<WH2595> against three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> and killed<WH2491> them,<WH8034> and had a name among the three.<WH7969>
Of the three,<WH7969> he was more honorable<WH3513> than the two,<WH8147> and was made their captain:<WH8269> however he didn't<WH935> attain to the three.<WH7969>

Benaiah<WH1141> the son<WH1121> of Jehoiada,<WH3077> the son<WH1121> of a valiant<WH2428> man<WH376> of Kabzeel,<WH6909> who had done mighty<WH7227> deeds,<WH6467> he killed<WH5221> the two<WH8147> sons<WH739> of Ariel of Moab:<WH4124> he went down<WH3381> also and killed<WH5221> a lion<WH738> in<WH8432> the midst of a pit<WH953> in time<WH3117> of snow.<WH7950>

He killed<WH5221> an Egyptian,<WH4713> a man<WH376> of great stature,<WH4060> five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> high;<WH4713> and in the Egyptian's hand<WH3027> was a spear<WH2595> like a weaver<WH707>'s beam;<WH4500> and he went down<WH3381> to him with a staff,<WH7626> and plucked<WH1497> the spear<WH2595> out of the Egyptian<WH4713>'s hand,<WH3027> and killed<WH2026> him with his own spear.<WH2595>
Benaiah<WH1141> the son<WH1121> of Jehoiada<WH3077> did<WH6213> these things,<WH8034> and had a name among the three<WH7969> mighty men.<WH1368>
Behold,<WH2009> he was more honorable<WH3513> than the thirty,<WH7970> but he didn't<WH935> attain to the three:<WH7969> and David<WH1732> set<WH7760> him over his guard.<WH4928>
Also the mighty men<WH1368> of the armies:<WH2428> Asahel<WH6214> the brother<WH251> of Joab,<WH3097> Elhanan<WH445> the son<WH1121> of Dodo<WH1734> of Bethlehem,<WH1035>
Shammoth<WH8054> the Harorite,<WH2033> Helez<WH2503> the Pelonite,<WH6397>
Ira<WH5896> the son<WH1121> of Ikkesh<WH6142> the Tekoite,<WH8621> Abiezer<WH44> the Anathothite,<WH6069>
Sibbecai<WH5444> the Hushathite,<WH2843> Ilai<WH5866> the Ahohite,<WH266>
Maharai<WH4121> the Netophathite,<WH5200> Heled<WH2466> the son<WH1121> of Baanah<WH1196> the Netophathite,<WH5200>
Ithai<WH863> the son<WH1121> of Ribai<WH7380> of Gibeah<WH1390> of the children<WH1121> of Benjamin,<WH1144> Benaiah<WH1141> the Pirathonite,<WH6553>
Hurai<WH2360> of the brooks<WH5158> of Gaash,<WH1608> Abiel<WH22> the Arbathite,<WH6164>
Azmaveth<WH5820> the Baharumite,<WH978> Eliahba<WH455> the Shaalbonite,<WH8170>
the sons<WH1121> of Hashem<WH2044> the Gizonite,<WH1493> Jonathan<WH3129> the son<WH1121> of Shagee<WH7681> the Hararite,<WH2043>
Ahiam<WH279> the son<WH1121> of Sacar<WH7940> the Hararite,<WH2043> Eliphal<WH465> the son<WH1121> of Ur,<WH218>
Hepher<WH2660> the Mecherathite,<WH4382> Ahijah<WH281> the Pelonite,<WH6397>
Hezro<WH2695> the Carmelite,<WH3761> Naarai<WH5293> the son<WH1121> of Ezbai,<WH229>
Joel<WH3100> the brother<WH251> of Nathan,<WH5416> Mibhar<WH4006> the son<WH1121> of Hagri,<WH1905>
Zelek<WH6768> the Ammonite,<WH5984> Naharai<WH5171> the Berothite,<WH1307> the armor bearer<WH5375> of Joab<WH3097> the son<WH1121> of Zeruiah,<WH6870>
Ira<WH5896> the Ithrite,<WH3505> Gareb<WH1619> the Ithrite,<WH3505>
Uriah<WH223> the Hittite,<WH2850> Zabad<WH2066> the son<WH1121> of Ahlai,<WH304>
Adina<WH5721> the son<WH1121> of Shiza<WH7877> the Reubenite,<WH7206> a chief<WH7218> of the Reubenites,<WH7206> and thirty with him,<WH7970>
Hanan<WH2605> the son<WH1121> of Maacah,<WH4601> and Joshaphat<WH3146> the Mithnite,<WH4981>
Uzzia<WH5814> the Ashterathite,<WH6254> Shama<WH8091> and Jeiel<WH3273> the sons<WH1121> of Hotham<WH2369> the Aroerite,<WH6200>
Jediael<WH3043> the son<WH1121> of Shimri,<WH8113> and Joha<WH3109> his brother,<WH251> the Tizite,<WH8491>
Eliel<WH447> the Mahavite,<WH4233> and Jeribai,<WH3403> and Joshaviah,<WH3145> the sons<WH1121> of Elnaam,<WH493> and Ithmah<WH3495> the Moabite,<WH4125>
Eliel,<WH447> and Obed,<WH5744> and Jaasiel<WH3300> the Mezobaite.<WH4677>
